column1: Peto Municipality is one of 106 municipalities in Yucatán State
column2: Mexico. It has a municipal seat of the same name and is located in the centre-south portion of the Yucatán
column3: 135 km to the south-east of state capital Mérida.

column1: The municipality is made up of 74 communities
column2: the most important include the following:

column1: Annual fairs: 29 April to 3 May; 26 December to 2 January

column2: a government-run indigenous community radio station.
